programme.title: Body
programme.desc: Three students break into a house mistakenly thinking it belongs to their friend, and end up accidentally killing the groundskeeper who catches them trespassing. They try to come up with an elaborate lie to cover up their crime, but their consiences begin to trouble them, with deadly consequences. Thriller, starring Helen Rogers, Alexandra Turshen and Lauren Molina.

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.

programme.title: Alex Zane's Cinecast
programme.desc: Alex Zane takes a look at the new films coming to Sky Cinema this month, highlighting all the biggest premieres and some of his personal favourites.

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7 Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits the Abu Dhabi set of the action movie sequel, and chats to stars Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson and Michelle Rodriguez.

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Two expeditions set out to climb to the summit of the world's highest mountain. Both parties of mountaineers get caught in one of the fiercest snowstorms ever recorded, and face a desperate struggle to survive against the elements. Fact-based adventure, starring Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, Jake Gyllenhaal and Keira Knightley.

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: A French acrobat hatches an audacious scheme to carry out his most spectacular performance in 1974. With the aid of his circus mentor and an international team of helpers, he plans to tightrope walk between the towers of the World Trade Centre. Fact-based drama, starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Two expeditions set out to climb to the summit of the world's highest mountain. Both parties of mountaineers get caught in one of the fiercest snowstorms ever recorded, and face a desperate struggle to survive against the elements. Fact-based adventure, starring Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, Jake Gyllenhaal and Keira Knightley.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.(n)

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: A woman offers help to a stranger who turns up on her doorstep, claiming his car has broken down and asking to use her phone. He soon reveals his true identity as a dangerous ex-convict, and she and her family face a battle for survival when they are held hostage in their own home. Thriller, starring Idris Elba and Taraji P Henson.

programme.title: Better Living Through Chemistry
programme.desc: A straight-laced pharmacist seeks a break from his boring life by having an affair with a customer. He soon has cause to regret his infidelity when his lover drags him on a disturbing journey involving sex, drugs and murder. Black comedy, starring Sam Rockwell, Olivia Wilde, Michelle Monaghan and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: Lost & Found
programme.desc: Sent to spend the summer on a remote and mysterious island, teenage brothers embark on a thrilling treasure hunt to restore their family's lost fortune. Adventure, starring Jason Patric, Justin Kelly, Benjamin Stockham and Celeste Desjardins.

programme.title: The Interview
programme.desc: The presenter of a lowbrow TV show and his producer plan a trip to North Korea after landing an exclusive interview with dictator Kim Jong-un. Before setting off, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate the politician - a task they are sorely underqualified to carry out. Controversial comedy, starring James Franco, Seth Rogen and Lizzy Caplan.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An orphan wins the fatherly affections of a tough-talking billionaire - but the no-good owner of the orphanage and her brother are out to ruin the girl's chances of happiness and make a quick profit in the process. Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Fighting Demons
programme.desc: After spending 12 years in prison for killing a man, a former boxer tries to reconnect with his family, but finds it difficult to get his life back on track. A romance seems to signal an upturn in his fortunes, until tragedy strikes. Drama, starring Sean Bean, Eva Longoria and Kate Walsh.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britain's leading spy following the assassination of all the country's other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller.

programme.title: Extinction: Jurassic Predators
programme.desc: A scientific expedition into the Amazon makes a remarkable discovery - an unexplored area of jungle where dinosaurs still exist. The explorers may not have a chance to make their discovery known, as the prehistoric beasts include several deadly predators whose hunting ground they have unwittingly entered. Fantasy adventure, starring Sarah Mac and Ben Loyd-Holmes.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes' duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes' duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan.

programme.title: Drift
programme.desc: Two rebellious brothers come up with a revolutionary approach to surfing, but their controversial behaviour makes them many enemies, including a gang of bikers. A film-maker is struck by their story, and sees the chance to help them change the nature of their sport. Drama, starring Sam Worthington, Xavier Samuel, Myles Pollard and Lesley-Ann Brandt.(n)

programme.title: Enemy
programme.desc: A professor who has become bored with his routine life spots a man in a film who looks exactly like him. He becomes obsessed with finding out who the actor playing the role is, and develops an intense relationship with his double's pregnant wife. Thriller based on the novel by Jose Saramago, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Melanie Laurent and Isabella Rossellini.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7 Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits the Abu Dhabi set of the action movie sequel, and chats to stars Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson and Michelle Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britain's leading spy following the assassination of all the country's other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Longwood
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Mickey Miller moves from New York to Ireland, where she discovers a link between herself and the 300-year-old legend of a mysterious knight who regularly haunts the sleepy village. But will it give her the power to save a previous herd of white horses? Magical family drama, starring Lucy Morton, Thekla Reuten, Fiona Glascott, Lorcan Cranitch and Miriam Margolyes.(n)

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Ageing recluse Oren turns his back on the outside world, while his neighbour Leah tries vainly to resurrect her singing career. When Oren's estranged son is imprisoned, he finds himself forced to look after his granddaughter and forms a connection with Leah as he seeks her help. Romantic comedy drama, with Michael Douglas and Diane Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A warrior is left a broken man when the nobleman he serves is put to death for refusing to pay tribute to a corrupt warlord. He seeks to redeem himself by reuniting his dead master's other soldiers and leading them into battle to avenge his death. Medieval action adventure, starring Clive Owen and Morgan Freeman.(n)

programme.title: Deliver Us from Evil
programme.desc: A New York cop is baffled by a series of disturbing, inexplicable crimes sweeping the city. He discovers the terrifying truth behind the crimewave when he meets an unconventional priest, who seeks his help in stopping an outbreak of demonic possessions. Horror, starring Eric Bana, Edgar Ramirez and Olivia Munn.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: A Cappella group the Barden Bellas enjoy an unprecedented run of success, until a disastrous performance sees them banned from national competitions and beset by scandal. They attempt to turn their fortunes around and redeem their legacy by competing in the World Championships of A Cappella in Copenhagen. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria.(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A computer hacker is released from prison after being convicted of committing cyber crimes. He's immediately enlisted by the FBI when they discover that one of his software codes is being used as part of a terrorist plot. Crime drama, starring Chris Hemsworth, Leehom Wang and Viola Davis.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: A Cappella group the Barden Bellas enjoy an unprecedented run of success, until a disastrous performance sees them banned from national competitions and beset by scandal. They attempt to turn their fortunes around and redeem their legacy by competing in the World Championships of A Cappella in Copenhagen. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A devoted husband is left at home alone when his family is away for the weekend. When two stranded women turn up on his doorstep, he invites them in and is tempted to take advantage of the opportunity - only to find himself drawn into a seductive and dangerous game of cat and mouse. Thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo and Ana de Armas.(n)

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A submarine captain working for a salvage company is laid off, and attempts to turn his fortunes around by recovering a lost treasure rumoured to have sunk to the depths of the Black Sea. However, greed, desperation and claustrophobia cause the members of his crew to turn against each other. Thriller, starring Jude Law and Jodie Whittaker.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A single woman begins a new year with resolutions to find love, quit her bad habits and take a step up the career ladder. Her plans crumble as she tries to deal with her mother's infidelity, get over a passionate fling with her boss and come to terms with her feelings for an uptight lawyer. Romantic comedy based on Helen Fielding's novel, starring Renee Zellweger, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth.

programme.title: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
programme.desc: Two lifelong friends are invited to their 10th high-school reunion, and come to realise they have not achieved anything with their lives. They decide to show up the old classmates by trying to pass themselves off as successful businesswomen, but maintaining the deception proves harder than expected. Comedy, starring Lisa Kudrow, Mira Sorvino, Janeane Garofalo and Alan Cumming.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A woman with dreams of becoming a journalist takes a job as assistant to the editor of a prestigious fashion magazine - a position that should guarantee a bright future if she succeeds. Unfortunately, she has just signed up to work for the boss from hell, whose cruel personality and outrageous demands make her life a nightmare. Comedy drama, with Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Stanley Tucci and Emily Blunt.

programme.title: Alex Zane's Cinecast
programme.desc: Alex Zane takes a look at the new films coming to Sky Cinema this month, highlighting all the biggest premieres and some of his personal favourites.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Gay rights activists gather in London for a pride march in 1984, and decide they have a common cause with the miners' strike. When their fundraising activities are rejected by the miners' union, they travel to a Welsh pit village to show their support in person. Fact-based drama, starring Ben Schnetzer, Bill Nighy, Andrew Scott and Imelda Staunton.

programme.title: Hot Shots
programme.desc: A pilot joins an elite squad to take part in a dangerous mission, but faces a struggle to live down his father's bad reputation - and win the love of a glamorous psychiatrist. Comedy spoofing action movies - principally Top Gun - starring Charlie Sheen, Lloyd Bridges, Valeria Golino, Cary Elwes, Kevin Dunn and William O'Leary.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Three friends decide to start their own business, but the plan is derailed when a duplicitous investor swindles them. They hatch a plan to get their money back by kidnapping the businessman's son and demanding a ransom. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Jason Sudeikis, Charlie Day, Jennifer Aniston and Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners 2
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Will, Simon and Neil find university life does not live up to their expectations, and are insanely jealous of Jay's stories of his gap year in Australia. Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Comedy sequel, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A Nascar racing champion has everything he could want - until an arrogant French rival seizes the title from him, and his wife runs off with his best friend. Forced to move back in with his mother, the downhearted driver turns to his estranged father for help rebuilding his shattered self-confidence. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A lazy twentysomething lives off his wealthy hotel magnate father. When the old man decides to retire, he begins to question whether his layabout son is suitable to take over the family empire and issues a challenge - he must retake 12 years of school in 24 weeks, or lose everything. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Bridgette Wilson, Darren McGavin and Bradley Whitford.

programme.title: Top Five
programme.desc: A comedian-turned-movie star is desperate to reinvent himself as a serious actor, while also preparing for his wedding to a reality TV celebrity. He spends a day being interviewed by a journalist, and their time together forces him to reflect on his past and what he really wants out of life. Comedy, directed by and starring Chris Rock, with Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Three friends decide to start their own business, but the plan is derailed when a duplicitous investor swindles them. They hatch a plan to get their money back by kidnapping the businessman's son and demanding a ransom. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Jason Sudeikis, Charlie Day, Jennifer Aniston and Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners 2
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Will, Simon and Neil find university life does not live up to their expectations, and are insanely jealous of Jay's stories of his gap year in Australia. Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Comedy sequel, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison.

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who S*****d Me
programme.desc: The sex-mad spy is sent back to swinging London at the height of the 1960s in pursuit of the dastardly Dr Evil, who has stolen the secret agent's `mojo'. Teaming up with a female American agent, Austin must stop his arch-rival from causing havoc with a doomsday weapon on the moon. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers in multiple roles alongside Heather Graham, Rob Lowe, Robert Wagner, Michael York, Seth Green and Verne Troyer.

programme.title: Mr Woodcock
programme.desc: The successful author of a self-help book has managed to put the painful memories of being bullied by his PE teacher as a chubby youngster behind him. However, when he returns to his home town to accept a prestigious award, the writer is horrified to discover his mother is planning to marry his childhood tormentor. Comedy, starring Billy Bob Thornton, Seann William Scott and Susan Sarandon.(n)

programme.title: Sex Ed
programme.desc: A teacher arrives at a new school, and is appalled to discover his teenage students are receiving no sex education. He takes it upon himself to provide the facts of life, despite objection from the local preacher. However, his plan is complicated by his still being a virgin and falling in love with a pupil's older sister. Comedy, starring Haley Joel Osment and Lorenza Izzo.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau fends off a murder syndicate led by his former police chief Dreyfus, who has been driven insane by his hatred for the bungling detective. However, doing away with the lucky lawman proves harder than anticipated - even for the world's best assassins. Comedy sequel, starring Peter Sellers, Herbert Lom, Lesley-Anne Down, Burt Kwouk and Leonard Rossiter.(n)

programme.title: Alex Zane's Cinecast
programme.desc: Alex Zane takes a look at the new films coming to Sky Cinema this month, highlighting all the biggest premieres and some of his personal favourites.(n)

programme.title: Think Like a Man Too
programme.desc: A couple announce they are getting married in Las Vegas, so all their friends descend on the gambling capital. However, the build-up to the big day descends into a bitter rivalry between the male and female guests over who can throw the wildest pre-marital party - despite the efforts of the groom's overbearing mother to disrupt the celebrations. Comedy sequel, starring Kevin Hart and Regina Hall.(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: A misunderstood soldier who has retired to a Buddhist monastery is drawn back into action for a special mission. A succession of failed rescue attempts has left countless American servicemen held hostage in the Middle East, and it falls to him to set them free. Spoof action movie sequel, starring Charlie Sheen, Valeria Golino, Lloyd Bridges and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Clumsy Maxwell Smart's dream to leave his desk job at a secret intelligence agency and become a fully-fledged spy comes true when the identities of all the agents are exposed. Maxwell's boss has no choice but to send him into action to battle a sinister terrorist organisation. Comedy, based on the 1960s TV series, with Steve Carell, Anne Hathaway, Dwayne Johnson, Alan Arkin, Terence Stamp and James Caan.(n)

programme.title: Alex Zane's Cinecast
programme.desc: Alex Zane takes a look at the new films coming to Sky Cinema this month, highlighting all the biggest premieres and some of his personal favourites.(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Family man Rusty Griswold spent his childhood family holidays stumbling from one disaster to another with his hapless father. He is determined that his own road trip with his wife and kids will go better - but soon finds the apple has not fallen far from the tree. Sequel to the 1980s comedy series, starring Ed Helms and Christina Applegate, with Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo reprising their roles.(n)

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Movie star Vincent Chase gets the chance of a lifetime when his former agent, now a studio executive, offers him the opportunity to direct and star in his latest picture. However, the project proves a troubled one, while his three best friends seek to exploit the situation to their own advantage. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Adrian Grenier, Kevin Connolly, Kevin Dillon and Jerry Ferrara.(n)

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: A lonely New Yorker is rescued from drowning by a mermaid, who falls in love with him and assumes human form so she can seek him out in Manhattan. He is soon equally smitten, and she resolves to keep her true nature a secret from him. However, an obsessive scientist suspects the truth and plans to prove it. Romantic fantasy comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah and John Candy.(n)

programme.title: Search Party
programme.desc: Distraught over the realization that they scared away their best friend's fiancee, two hard-partying pals set out on a wild journey to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary. Comedy, starring Adam Pally, TJ Miller and Thomas Middleditch.(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Family man Rusty Griswold spent his childhood family holidays stumbling from one disaster to another with his hapless father. He is determined that his own road trip with his wife and kids will go better - but soon finds the apple has not fallen far from the tree. Sequel to the 1980s comedy series, starring Ed Helms and Christina Applegate, with Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo reprising their roles.(n)

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Movie star Vincent Chase gets the chance of a lifetime when his former agent, now a studio executive, offers him the opportunity to direct and star in his latest picture. However, the project proves a troubled one, while his three best friends seek to exploit the situation to their own advantage. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Adrian Grenier, Kevin Connolly, Kevin Dillon and Jerry Ferrara.(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: A failed rock star carves out a career as a popular wedding singer, but his hopes for a bright future are dashed when his fiancee jilts him at the altar and he tries to shut himself off from the outside world. At one of his functions, a waitress catches his eye - but unfortunately for him, she is already engaged to someone else. Romantic comedy set in the 1980s, starring Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore.(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 2
programme.desc: The two mismatched detectives travel to Hong Kong when terrorists bomb the US embassy, and are soon involved in keeping tabs on the prime suspects - high-ranking Triad members involved in an international counterfeiting ring. Action comedy sequel, starring Jackie Chan, Chris Tucker, John Lone, Zhang Ziyi, Roselyn Sanchez and Harris Yulin.

programme.title: Alien Resurrection
programme.desc: Scientists create a clone of Ripley to get hold of the alien queen growing inside her body and breed a new race of the monsters. However, when the creatures escape and turn on their makers, the new Ripley must lead a smuggling crew caught up in the mayhem to safety. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brody's two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton.

programme.title: X-Men 2
programme.desc: Mutant heroes the X-Men are forced into an uneasy alliance with arch-enemy Magneto to battle a common foe. Following an attempt on the president's life, a sinister military scientist launches a raid on Professor Xavier's school and hatches a plan to rid the world of all mutants. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Alan Cumming, Halle Berry and Brian Cox.

programme.title: Alex Zane's Cinecast
programme.desc: Alex Zane takes a look at the new films coming to Sky Cinema this month, highlighting all the biggest premieres and some of his personal favourites.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogramme the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary young woman discovers she is the Queen of the Earth, and has the power to save it from destruction. With an alien warrior at her side, she sets about protecting the planet from an evil overlord. Sci-fi adventure, starring Mila Kunis, Channing Tatum, Eddie Redmayne and Sean Bean.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: An ageing professional monster hunter hires a young apprentice and sets about teaching him the tricks of his trade - and the duo will need to use them all if they are to recapture the evil queen of the witches after she escapes from the pit in which she was incarcerated. Fantasy adventure, starring Ben Barnes, Jeff Bridges and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: X-Men 2
programme.desc: Mutant heroes the X-Men are forced into an uneasy alliance with arch-enemy Magneto to battle a common foe. Following an attempt on the president's life, a sinister military scientist launches a raid on Professor Xavier's school and hatches a plan to rid the world of all mutants. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Alan Cumming, Halle Berry and Brian Cox.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary young woman discovers she is the Queen of the Earth, and has the power to save it from destruction. With an alien warrior at her side, she sets about protecting the planet from an evil overlord. Sci-fi adventure, starring Mila Kunis, Channing Tatum, Eddie Redmayne and Sean Bean.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogramme the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel.

programme.title: Reign of Fire
programme.desc: In the aftermath of decades of apocalyptic attacks by dragons, small pockets of survivors try to stave off the scaly fire-breathers. However, the meagre remains of the world's heavy artillery are not enough to stop them, so a small group of people joins forces with a zealous dragon slayer in a final bid to save the world from destruction. Fantasy adventure, with Christian Bale and Matthew McConaughey.(n)

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: John Connor finds his destiny to lead the human race in a future war is catching up with him when an advanced new Terminator in female form is sent back in time to eliminate him. However, a reprogrammed cyborg has also been dispatched to act as his protector. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: A swashbuckling sailor stumbles across a golden tablet that forms part of a map revealing the way to a magic fountain, which is fabled to bestow untold riches and eternal youth. But first the brave mariner has to battle storms, monsters and the trickery of an evil wizard before he can reach his goal. Fantasy adventure, with John Phillip Law, Tom Baker, Douglas Wilmer, Martin Shaw and Caroline Munro, with effects by Ray Harryhausen.(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary computer salesman leads a double life as a secret agent battling international terrorism. His naive wife is unaware of his dual employment, and goes in search of adventure - only to end up in the clutches of terrorists who have stolen a nuclear weapon. James Cameron's action comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis and Tom Arnold.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: The mutant heroes return to face a battle on three fronts. Arch-enemy Magneto is back with an army of followers, while a corporation has created a drug that permanently robs mutants of their powers. Meanwhile, their former ally Jean Grey has returned from the dead as the destructive and seemingly unstoppable Phoenix. The third instalment of the superhero saga, starring Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen, Halle Berry and Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Roman general Maximus Decimus Meridius is a casualty of a power struggle between the corrupt Emperor Commodus and the senate. Ordered to be put to death along with his family, he escapes his would-be killers but is sold into slavery as a gladiator - but uses his fame in the arena to fight against the tyrant. Oscar-winning period epic, with Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Derek Jacobi and Oliver Reed, in his last film role.(n)

programme.title: Into the Storm
programme.desc: A small town is unexpectedly ravaged by a series of devastating tornados. When it emerges that this was merely part of an even larger crisis, the townsfolk flee for their lives as scientists set out to monitor the event, while thrill-seekers risk their lives for the chance to experience a twister close-up. Disaster movie, starring Richard Armitage and Sarah Wayne Callies.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: The mutant heroes return to face a battle on three fronts. Arch-enemy Magneto is back with an army of followers, while a corporation has created a drug that permanently robs mutants of their powers. Meanwhile, their former ally Jean Grey has returned from the dead as the destructive and seemingly unstoppable Phoenix. The third instalment of the superhero saga, starring Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen, Halle Berry and Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Spectre

While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall

Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire"}, (?)
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr and Renee Zellweger. As a top agent at Sports Management International, Jerry Maguire knows his way around and is his own man... until one day he gets an attack of decency and finds himself out of a job. Now he must start from scratch. His only allies are a single mother, her cheeky young son and a second-rate player for the Arizona Cardinals.(r)

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut"}, (?)
programme.desc: Psychological drama, the last film by director Stanley Kubrick, starring Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman. Unsettled by his wife's confession of erotic fantasies about another man, Dr William Harford is thrown into a series of destructive sexual encounters that threaten to engulf him and destroy his marriage.(r)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7 Special"}, (?)
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits the Abu Dhabi set of the action movie sequel, and chats to stars Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson and Michelle Rodriguez.(r)

programme.title: Star Trek: the Motion Picture"}, (?)
programme.desc: The first sci-fi adventure movie based on the cult TV series, starring William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy. An unknown and awesome force is heading towards Federation space, on a direct course for Earth. The USS Enterprise is ordered back into immediate service and, with Captain James T Kirk once again in command, sets out to confront the mysterious alien menace.

programme.title: Star Trek II: the Wrath of Khan"}, (?)
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure sequel starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and Ricardo Montalban. In the 23rd century, Admiral James T Kirk is a guest aboard the Enterprise, which is taking part in a training exercise. But the routine voyage becomes a serious mission when his old ship is lured into a deadly trap, placing Kirk and his companions at the mercy of a crazed adversary, the formidable Khan.

programme.title: Star Trek III: the Search for Spock"}, (?)
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring William Shatner and DeForest Kelley. Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. However, the Vulcan's spirit is still with the crew, and back on the artificial Eden of the new Genesis planet his corpse is missing. Against orders, Admiral Kirk decides to lead the search for Spock and bring him home.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: the Voyage Home"}, (?)
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. In the 23rd century, Captain Kirk and his intrepid band of space travellers discover a probe in the vicinity of Earth that is trying to contact a humpback whale, a species that is extinct. In order to prevent the probe destroying the planet, Kirk and his crew visit 1986 San Francisco in order to locate two whales to take back to the future.

programme.title: Star Trek V: the Final Frontier"}, (?)
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure based on the popular TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The captain and crew of the untested new starship Enterprise travel to the desolate world of Nimbus III after a Vulcan mystic kidnaps a group of Federation diplomats. There, they find themselves caught up in a dangerous quest.

programme.title: Star Trek VI: the Undiscovered Country"}, (?)
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The original crew of the Enterprise is given one final mission, to oversee the integration of the Klingons, who claim they want peace, into the intergalactic Federation. Initial hostility between the old adversaries is worsened by attacks against the Klingons from an unknown enemy within the Enterprise, and Kirk finds himself on the Klingons' home world, standing trial for murder.

programme.title: Star Trek: Generations"}, (?)
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Patrick Stewart and featuring William Shatner. When an evil alien threatens to destroy a star system along with millions of lives, Captain Jean-Luc Picard travels into a time vortex to enlist the help of his famous predecessor, James T Kirk.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact"}, (?)
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Patrick Stewart. During a Federation encounter with the Borg, a sphere escapes into the Earth's past via a temporal vortex. Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise take up the challenge to pursue the Federation's most fearsome enemy and stop them from changing the future.

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection"}, (?)
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Patrick Stewart and Jonathan Frakes. The planet Ba'ku holds magical properties that keep the population young and living in harmony. So when an alien race attempts to take over this paradise, it falls to Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise to defend the planet and its people.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis"} (?)
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure - the tenth entry in the franchise - starring Patrick Stewart. The crew of the Enterprise are on the verge of splitting up, following the wedding of Riker and Troi, when they are sent to investigate a suspect Romulan treaty. On arrival, they discover that the new leader of Romulus is the spitting image of Captain Picard.

programme.title: Star Trek"}, (?)
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Zachary Quinto and Chris Pine. Rebellious youth James Kirk is persuaded to join the Starfleet Academy, where he befriends Dr Leonard 'Bones' McCoy and clashes with officer Spock. When an evil Romulan arrives from the future, the young crew of the USS Enterprise find themselves in the thick of the action.(n)

programme.title: The Kid
programme.desc: A hard-nosed image consultant notices that the eight-year-old who seems to be following him around bears a striking resemblance to himself as a lad. Before long, he realises the boy is his childhood self and is offering him the chance to change the present for the better by confronting the mistakes of the past. Disney comedy, starring Bruce Willis, Spencer Breslin, Emily Mortimer and Lily Tomlin.

programme.title: Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has a Glitch
programme.desc: The odd couple return for this animated sequel, in which the lovable, loopy alien gives his adopted family more problems thanks to a major malfunction. With the voices of Dakota Fanning, Tia Carrere and Holliston Coleman.

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: A battle-hardened military veteran fails to protect a government scientist from assassins. He is assigned to safeguard the dead boffin's family in case the killers come after the top-secret technology in his home, but finds looking after kids proves far tougher than taking on hitmen. Family comedy, starring Vin Diesel and Lauren Graham.

programme.title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie
programme.desc: Winnie the Pooh and his pals hear rumbling noises in the distance, and bravely set out to trap the feared and monstrous heffalump. Meanwhile, Roo stays at home and makes friends with a young and amiable heffalump named Lumpy, proving once and for all that the creatures are nothing to be afraid of. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and Brenda Blethyn.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: The Princess and the Frog
programme.desc: A hard-working New Orleans waitress meets an arrogant prince who has been turned into a frog by a magic spell. When she tries to break the enchantment by kissing him, she also ends up transformed into an amphibian, and together they go in search of the voodoo queen who can change them back. Disney animated musical fantasy, with the voices of Anika Noni Rose and Bruno Campos.

programme.title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: A racing plane suffers damage to his engine, and realises he can never compete again. He starts a new career as a member of a firefighting squadron, which proves more dangerous than he expected when the aircraft have to deal with a massive forest blaze. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Dane Cook and Ed Harris.

programme.title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie
programme.desc: Winnie the Pooh and his pals hear rumbling noises in the distance, and bravely set out to trap the feared and monstrous heffalump. Meanwhile, Roo stays at home and makes friends with a young and amiable heffalump named Lumpy, proving once and for all that the creatures are nothing to be afraid of. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and Brenda Blethyn.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith.

programme.title: John Henry
programme.desc: Disney's retelling of the legend of the steel-driving man, John Henry.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith.

programme.title: The Sword in the Stone
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure about King Arthur's first childhood encounter with the absent-minded magician Merlin in a forest. The kindly wizard takes the youngster under his wing and teaches him the ways of the world - leading to an incident with a crazed witch and the event that will change the future king's life for ever. With the voices of Rickie Sorenson, Karl Swenson and Martha Wentworth.

programme.title: The Last Flight of Noah's Ark
programme.desc: A rough-and-ready pilot reluctantly agrees to fly a prim missionary, two young stowaways and a cargo of wild animals across the Pacific, but the journey ends in disaster when they are stranded on a remote island. Disney adventure, starring Elliott Gould, Genevieve Bujold, Ricky Schroder, Tammy Lauren and Vincent Gardenia.

programme.title: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
programme.desc: Scrooge McDuck and great-nephews Huey, Dewey and Louie lead an archaeological expedition to find a long-lost genie's lamp once belonging to a notorious bandit, but reckon without a villainous attempt to use its powers in a dastardly plot. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Christopher Lloyd, Alan Young and Russi Taylor.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure
programme.desc: The little pup struggles to establish his own identity among his numerous brothers and sisters. He embarks on an exciting escapade across the capital with his favourite TV star, but the sinister Cruella DeVil returns to cause more havoc. Animated sequel, with the voices of Bobby Lockwood, Barry Bostwick, Jason Alexander, Martin Short and Sam West.(n)

programme.title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie
programme.desc: Winnie the Pooh and his pals hear rumbling noises in the distance, and bravely set out to trap the feared and monstrous heffalump. Meanwhile, Roo stays at home and makes friends with a young and amiable heffalump named Lumpy, proving once and for all that the creatures are nothing to be afraid of. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and Brenda Blethyn.(n)

programme.title: Stitch! The Movie
programme.desc: Animation following the further adventures of the little alien, as a host of his fellow experimental creatures arrive on Earth. However, their chaotic efforts to make themselves at home are threatened by the evil Captain Gantu, who is hot on their heels and determined to capture them. With the voices of Chris Sanders, Daveigh Chase, Ving Rhames and David Ogden Stiers.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The adventures of the legendary outlaw and Sherwood Forest's band of heroes as they rob the rich to feed the poor, while evil Prince John hatches a cunning plan to exact revenge and finish off the brigands. Disney animation, with the voices of Terry-Thomas, Peter Ustinov, Phil Harris, Brian Bedford and Monica Evans.(n)

programme.title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
programme.desc: Anthology of animated tales based on AA Milne's stories, following a series of exploits of the dim-witted bear and his collection of unusual friends. With the voices of Sterling Holloway, Paul Winchell, Sebastian Cabot and Junius Matthews.(n)

programme.title: Oliver & Company
programme.desc: An orphaned kitten abandoned on the streets of New York is given shelter by a gang of canine thieves and their penniless owner, who is struggling to pay his debts to a brutal thug. Later, the kitten meets a kindly little girl and he thinks he has finally found a new home - but ends up leading her into danger. Animated adventure inspired by Oliver Twist, with the voices of Joey Lawrence, Billy Joel and Bette Midler.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Alice in Wonderland
programme.desc: A girl meets a mysterious talking rabbit and follows the creature down a hole in the ground. She finds herself in a magical world inhabited by all manner of bizarre creatures and dominated by a short-tempered queen fond of beheading those who displease her. Disney animated fantasy based on Lewis Carroll's novel, with the voices of Kathryn Beaumont and Ed Wynn.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The adventures of the legendary outlaw and Sherwood Forest's band of heroes as they rob the rich to feed the poor, while evil Prince John hatches a cunning plan to exact revenge and finish off the brigands. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.(n)

programme.title: Escape to Witch Mountain
programme.desc: Two psychic children go on the run in an attempt to discover their true origin, hotly pursued by a wicked millionaire who wants to make use of their powers. A lonely widowed man helps them to escape, and leads them on a journey to a mountain where they believe their parents are waiting for them. Disney sci-fi adventure, starring Ray Milland, Donald Pleasence and Eddie Albert.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.(n)

programme.title: One of Our Dinosaurs Is Missing
programme.desc: Chinese secret agents try to get their hands on a stolen microfilm hidden in a dinosaur skeleton in London's Natural History Museum - but a group of indomitable nannies comes up with a plan to stop them getting hold of it by stealing the prehistoric remains. Disney family comedy, starring Peter Ustinov, Derek Nimmo, Joan Sims and Helen Hayes.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr.

programme.title: Inside Out: Special
programme.desc: The making of the Pixar animation, taking viewers inside the mind of a youngster as she copes with the emotional upheaval of moving to a new town and new school.

programme.title: My Girl
programme.desc: A lonely 11-year-old tomboy feels responsible for her mother's death, but a boy's friendship helps her get through her emotional problems. Meanwhile, when she realises her father is falling in love with his new employee, she sets out to do all she can to end the romance. Drama, starring Anna Chlumsky, Macaulay Culkin, Dan Aykroyd and Jamie Lee Curtis.

programme.title: Ghosthunters: On Icy Trails
programme.desc: A fearful young boy forms an unlikely bond with a loveable green ghost and tries to help him reclaim his haunted house. Family adventure, starring Anke Engelke, Milo Parker and the voice of Bastian Pastewka.

programme.title: Dino Time
programme.desc: Three children accidentally activate a time-travel device which transports them 65 million years back in time, where they are protected by a friendly dinosaur. But can they find a way to return to the 21st century while steering clear of all sorts of prehistoric dangers? Animation, featuring the voices of Melanie Griffith, Pamela Adlon and Tara Strong.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.

programme.title: My Girl

Drama, starring Anna Chlumsky, Macaulay Culkin, Dan Aykroyd and Jamie Lee Curtis.

Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: The young wizard continues his search for the artefacts containing fragments of the dark lord Voldemort's soul. Time is running out, as the evil sorcerer is aware of Harry's mission, and marshals his forces for a final, devastating attack on Harry and his friends at Hogwarts school. Conclusion of the fantasy saga, with Daniel Radcliffe, Ralph Fiennes, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson and Alan Rickman.

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: A Miami street dancer faces a series of setbacks as he seeks his fortune in Hollywood. He assembles a team of dancers which prove successful in a reality TV contest broadcast from Las Vegas, but struggles to put aside old conflicts in the pursuit of his dreams. Fifth film in the dance drama series, starring Ryan Guzman and Briana Evigan.

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets.(n)

programme.title: The Fox and the Child
programme.desc: A young girl living in the mountains becomes fascinated by a wild fox inhabiting the woods. She gradually wins the trust of the animal, and a close bond develops. However, her efforts to domesticate the creature and treat it like a family pet have tragic consequences. Drama, starring Bertille Noel-Bruneau and narrated by Kate Winslet.(n)

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: A Miami street dancer faces a series of setbacks as he seeks his fortune in Hollywood. He assembles a team of dancers which prove successful in a reality TV contest broadcast from Las Vegas, but struggles to put aside old conflicts in the pursuit of his dreams. Fifth film in the dance drama series, starring Ryan Guzman and Briana Evigan.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of the new movie adaptation of the fairytale, starring Lily James, Richard Madden and Cate Blanchett.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
programme.desc: The amateur detectives attend the grand opening of a museum in their honour, featuring the costumes from all the fake monsters they exposed. The exhibits are stolen by a masked villain, who sets about re-creating all the gang's worst enemies. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr and Linda Cardellini.(n)

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: A squirrel living in a city park faces a harsh winter ahead. He sees fresh hope when he discovers a shop selling nuts, and recruits the other animals to carry out a daring heist that will provide enough food to keep them going through the cold months ahead. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Arnett, Brendan Fraser and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent the precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas.(n)

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: A businessman running for mayor of New York saves the life of an orphan, and invites her to live with him as a publicity stunt. The tycoon's cynical nature is chipped away at by the youngster's sunny disposition. Meanwhile, her cruel foster mother hatches a kidnapping plot. Musical remake, starring Quvenzhane Wallis, Jamie Foxx, Cameron Diaz and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.(n)

programme.title: The Nut Job

Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: A teenager living in a peaceful community is sent to assist the old man who is the keeper of the settlement's history. The assignment leads him to uncover the dark secrets behind his idyllic surroundings, and he realises he must find a way to escape. Sci-fi adventure based on Lois Lowry's novel, starring Jeff Bridges, Brenton Thwaites and Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: Turbulence
programme.desc: A convicted killer breaks free while being flown to his place of execution on Christmas eve, and embarks on a murderous rampage, leaving a plucky stewardess with the harrowing task of outwitting him. Thriller, starring Ray Liotta, Lauren Holly, Brendan Gleeson, Ben Cross and Hector Elizondo.

programme.title: Surveillance
programme.desc: Two FBI agents on the trail of a serial killer head to a police station in the middle of the Sante Fe desert to quiz three survivors of a brutal attack which saw five people slain. However, as they quiz the eyewitnesses and emerge with different versions of the same event, it becomes apparent that all is not what it seems. Thriller, with Julia Ormond, Bill Pullman, Pell James, Ryan Simpkins and French Stewart.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two teenagers murder a random victim for their own amusement, convinced nobody will ever suspect them of committing such a senseless crime, and ensure all the evidence points to a drug dealer. However, they reckon without a suspicious and determined detective and her partner. Thriller, starring Sandra Bullock, Ryan Gosling and Michael Pitt.

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.

programme.title: After the Sunset
programme.desc: A veteran jewel thief seems to have it all, enjoying a relaxing retirement in a Caribbean paradise - but the lure of one last heist looks set to be his downfall as an old enemy plots to finally collar the crook. Comedy thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Woody Harrelson, Don Cheadle and Naomie Harris.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes.

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A journalist is driven to the brink of suicide by a smear campaign after he attempts to expose the CIA's alleged involvement with Contra rebels in Nicaragua and the importing of cocaine into California. Fact-based drama set during the 1990s, starring Jeremy Renner, Rosemarie DeWitt and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A former gangster is released from jail and vows to go straight, hoping to earn enough money to escape his New York roots - but his misguided loyalty to a crooked lawyer threatens to drag him back into a life of crime. Brian De Palma's thriller, starring Al Pacino, Sean Penn, Penelope Ann Miller, John Leguizamo and Viggo Mortensen.

programme.title: Return to Sender
programme.desc: A small-town nurse goes on a blind date with a stranger who rapes her. As she struggles to rebuild her life, she takes to regularly visiting her attacker in prison. However, when he is released, he discovers she has been planning her revenge. Thriller, starring Rosamund Pike, Shiloh Fernandez and Nick Nolte.

programme.title: The Loft
programme.desc: Five successful married men rent an apartment where they can carry out their extra-marital affairs in secret. The arrangement works well until they find the corpse of a beautiful woman handcuffed to a bed - but which of them is the killer, and how will the grisly discovery affect their friendship? Thriller, with Karl Urban, James Marsden and Wentworth Miller.(n)

programme.title: Reclaim
programme.desc: A couple go to Haiti to adopt a child, only to find they have fallen prey to a scam when the girl, their money and all records of the arrangement disappear without trace. They decide to try and rescue her from the criminals holding her, but their efforts lead to them being kidnapped. Thriller, starring John Cusack, Ryan Phillippe and Rachelle Lefevre.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: American Heist
programme.desc: A man with a shady past is planning to start his own business, but is drawn back into the criminal underworld when his brother is released from prison. The ex-convict has a dangerous plan for an elaborate bank robbery, and family loyalty drives his brother to get involved. Crime drama, starring Adrien Brody, Hayden Christensen and Jordana Brewster.(n)

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: A reformed criminal's daughter is murdered, and he becomes convinced she was killed at the order of a Russian gangster he once stole from. He and his former partners in crime launch a campaign of violence against the mobster and his cronies, but his wife begins to fear for what his mission of vengeance will turn him into. Crime thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Danny Glover.(n)

programme.title: Tracers
programme.desc: A New York bike messenger ends up heavily in debt to Chinese gangsters, and needs to make a lot of money quickly. Salvation arrives when he joins a gang of criminals, who use their parkour skills to pull off a series of seemingly impossible heists. Action adventure, starring Taylor Lautner and Marie Avgeropoulos.(n)

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: A politician's idealistic attitude to his career is contrasted by a disastrous personal life. He is forced to rethink his priorities when a sex scandal brings his reputation into disrepute in the aftermath of a catastrophic oil spill. Drama, starring Nicolas Cage, Sarah Paulson, Connie Nielsen and Peter Fonda.(n)

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.(n)

programme.title: Cold in July
programme.desc: A small-town man is hailed as a hero after he shoots dead a burglar who had broken into his home. He begins to fear for his life when the thief's father turns up seeking revenge, which is only the first in a series of events that plunge his simple life into chaos. Crime thriller based on Joe R Lansdale's novel, starring Michael C Hall, Sam Shepard and Don Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Tracers
programme.desc: A New York bike messenger ends up heavily in debt to Chinese gangsters, and needs to make a lot of money quickly. Salvation arrives when he joins a gang of criminals, who use their parkour skills to pull off a series of seemingly impossible heists. Action adventure, starring Taylor Lautner and Marie Avgeropoulos.(n)

As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.(n)

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Five criminals are brought together by a police line-up, and decide to join forces to pull off one more big job. However, they discover their meeting was not a coincidence and that a mysterious crime lord has plans for them. Bryan Singer's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Kevin Spacey, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak, Stephen Baldwin, Pete Postlethwaite, Chazz Palminteri and Suzy Amis.(n)

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: Three backpackers travelling across Europe hear of a Slovakian inn where their every hedonistic desire will be met. However, they discover they have been lured into the clutches of wealthy depraved businessmen who pay for the chance to torture people to death. Horror, starring Jay Hernandez, Derek Richardson and Eythor Gudjonsson.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: A couple move into a new apartment, and the husband forms a close friendship with their elderly neighbours. The wife soon becomes pregnant, and starts to suspect her spouse has been seduced into a Satanic cult, who have sinister plans for her baby. Roman Polanski's horror, based on the novel by Ira Levin, and starring Mia Farrow, John Cassavetes, Oscar-winner Ruth Gordon, Sidney Blackmer and Ralph Bellamy.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: An explorer discovers a prehistoric monster-infested world deep beneath Earth's crust and faces a tough ordeal escaping the predatory attacks of the creatures as he tries to guide his team back to safety. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Pat Boone, James Mason, Arlene Dahl and Diane Baker.

programme.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A lonely boy befriends an alien who has been left stranded on Earth. The two develop a psychic connection as the boy helps the extraterrestrial to contact his own people and call for rescue. However, living on Earth starts to have a devastating effect on the visitor's health, and a government operative is determined to capture him for study. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi fantasy, starring Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Dee Wallace and Peter Coyote.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A wealthy old man dying of cancer arranges to have his consciousness transplanted into a younger body. The procedure is a success, but he begins to have suspicions about where his new body came from - only to find that the company behind the process will kill to protect their dark secrets. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A cyborg assassin is sent on a murderous mission back in time to the 20th century, where he wreaks havoc while searching for his intended victim - a woman whose unborn son is destined to lead the human race in a war against machines. However, a soldier has also been sent from the future to protect her. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton and Michael Biehn.

programme.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A lonely boy befriends an alien who has been left stranded on Earth. The two develop a psychic connection as the boy helps the extraterrestrial to contact his own people and call for rescue. However, a soldier has also been sent from the future to protect her. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton and Michael Biehn.

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A guitarist and his fiancee are murdered on Halloween by the henchman of a world-weary gangster. One year later, the musician is restored to the land of the living by a mystical crow, and rendered indestructible so he can take revenge on the killers. Fantasy thriller based on the graphic novel, starring Brandon Lee, Michael Wincott and Ernie Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy sequel, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast.(n)

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: An explorer discovers a prehistoric monster-infested world deep beneath Earth's crust and faces a tough ordeal escaping the predatory attacks of the creatures as he tries to guide his team back to safety. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Pat Boone, James Mason, Arlene Dahl and Diane Baker.(n)

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The super-powered team takes on a mysterious alien who has been sent by his planet-eating master to prepare Earth for obliteration. While the four heroes try to find a way to foil its plans, an old enemy returns, intent on seizing the extraterrestrial's power. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Michael Chiklis, Chris Evans and Jessica Alba, with the voice of Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A colony of super-intelligent apes thrives following a global virus outbreak that wipes out much of the human race. A survivor tries to make peace with the leader of the apes, but their efforts to reach an understanding are threatened by warmongers on both sides. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke and Gary Oldman.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The super-powered team takes on a mysterious alien who has been sent by his planet-eating master to prepare Earth for obliteration. While the four heroes try to find a way to foil its plans, an old enemy returns, intent on seizing the extraterrestrial's power. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Michael Chiklis, Chris Evans and Jessica Alba, with the voice of Laurence Fishburne.(n)
