programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Acting superstars Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe are captivating in this absorbing crime epic set in the early 1970s. Washington is real-life Harlem drug kingpin Frank Lucas, and Crowe plays Det. Richie Roberts, the N.Y. cop trying to nail him. A top-flight supporting cast is highlighted by Best Supporting Actress nominee Ruby Dee as Lucas's mother. Directed by Ridley Scott, from a script by Steven Zaillian(n)

programme.title: All the Way
programme.desc: Adaptation of Robert Schenkkan's Tony Award-winning play about the early days of Lyndon B. Johnson's presidency, from the assassination of John F. Kennedy to the battle over the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and his campaign to stay in the White House(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this hysterical big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party(n)

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue submarine captain accepts a potentially lucrative offer to retrieve a missing treasure from the Black Sea, despite the sneaking suspicion that he might end up being double-crossed in this thrilling adventure(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: John Oliver reviews the biggest news and cultural events of the week from a satirical angle(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Republican consultant Frank Luntz and actor Viggo Mortensen are the interview guests. The panelists are writer Jelani Cobb, political commentator S.E. Cupp and former New York governor Eliot Spitzer(n)

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: Subtle Beast. Naz gets legal advice from his attorney, John Stone, while Det. Dennis Box investigates the crime(n)

programme.title: Amy Schumer: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Comedian Amy Schumer performs in New York City at the Apollo Theater. Directed by Chris Rock

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: In this utterly unique comedy, a bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement

programme.title: Wagons East!
programme.desc: Tired of frontier living, a group of pioneers decide to give up and go home in this comedy. Unfortunately, they are saddled with a drunken, bumbling wagon-master, and are soon under attack from gunslingers hired by a group of pro-frontier railroad barons who want to keep them from reaching home

programme.title: The Ladies' Man
programme.desc: Sight gags are the show as Jerry Lewis clowns it up as a houseboy in a women's boardinghouse. Helen Welenmelon: Helen Traubel. Fay: Pat Stanley. Katie: Kathleen Freeman. Directed by Lewis

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Those lovable chubby-cheeked chipmunks Alivin, Simon and Theodore make their big screen debut in this entertaining tale of how they met mentor and father figure Dave. Forced to move after their home becomes a christmas tree for a record company, they move into Dave's home without his knowledge. He's not too thrilled to have rodents in his kitchen, but when he hears them sing he realises he might have found a way to rejuvenate his career - and make them stars! Listen out for the voice of Criminal Minds star Matthew Gray Gubler as Simon

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Congressman Evan Baxter is settling into a new life of political importance when God appears and tells him to build an ark. Evan thinks he's going mad, but before long, animals and deliveries of wood persuade him that it might be his destiny to be the modern-day Noah after all

programme.title: Fathers' Day
programme.desc: The stage is set for comedy when two middle-aged men (Billy Crystal and Robin Williams) struggle to overcome their considerable differences to find the runaway son of the ex-lover who has just informed them that one of them is the boy's father

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Teen comedy sequel in which a group of friends are reunited after their freshman year of college and embark upon a series of comical adventures when they rent a summer house on Lake Michigan

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Two inept pals become embroiled in a kidnapping plot when they try to return a briefcase to a lovely woman, who left it in an airport...on purpose

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Disappointing but visually arresting live-action adaptation of a British-TV puppet fantasy from the '60s. It follows a family of space-age heroes battling evil

programme.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
programme.desc: When Texas authorities attempt to close down the Chicken Ranch, a popular Texas brothel, the local madam fights to save her business—singing and dancing all the way

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: In this throwback monster movie from producer Dean Devlin (Independence Day, Godzilla), David Arquette plays the son of a deceased mine owner, returning home to the economically depressed hamlet of Prosperity, AZ, after a long absence. His arrival coincides with a toxic waste accident in the local water supply, the result of a barrel jostled loose from the back of a passing truck. Unfortunately, said water source abuts the region's least-popular attraction: an exotic spider farm. The farm's owner (Tom Noonan) becomes the first victim when the spiders, already possessed of keen predatory abilities, grow to the size of small automobiles. Laying in wait underground, they begin picking off the town's pet and ostrich population, and soon it's all the local sheriff (Kari Wuhrer) can do to raise the alarm before the siege begins. Eight Legged Freaks was produced under the working title "Arac Attack," but the politically conscious producers, concerned the title sounded too much like "Iraq Attack," went with Arquette's brainstorm as a safer alternative

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Teen comedy sequel in which a group of friends are reunited after their freshman year of college and embark upon a series of comical adventures when they rent a summer house on Lake Michigan

programme.title: Making of 'Trainwreck'
programme.desc: A look at "Trainwreck," a 2015 comedy about a commitment-phobic woman who finds herself falling for the subject of an article she's writing for a men's magazine. The film stars Amy Schumer, Bill Hader and Tilda Swinton, and is written by Schumer and directed by Judd Apatow

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Republican consultant Frank Luntz and actor Viggo Mortensen are the interview guests. The panelists are writer Jelani Cobb, political commentator S.E. Cupp and former New York governor Eliot Spitzer

programme.title: National Lampoon's Van Wilder
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds plays the eponymous hero in Walter Becker's comedy, now in his seventh year at college and whose mission in life is to help all the undergrads have a good time (and in the case of the girls, join him in bed). When his father withdraws his funding our hero is forced to earn his money organising pay parties. They're so successful that the college paper gets interested, but if his secret gets out, he'll be expelled. Can he persuade reporter Tara Reid (currently guest starring in Scrubs on Channel 4 Friday nights) that what he does serves a useful purpose on campus?

programme.title: Freddy Got Fingered
programme.desc: A deranged 28-year-old wannabe cartoonist tries to make it big in Hollywood(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Coming-of-age comedy concerning four high-school friends who vow to lose their virginity by prom night(n)

programme.title: HBO Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Marc Maron. Stand-up comedian Marc Maron's set covers drugs, smoking sections and the information superhighway. Taped at San Francisco's Fillmore Auditorium(n)

programme.title: According to Spencer
programme.desc: A young man moves to Los Angeles to make something of himself -- but finds that such a task might take a little more work than he thought -- in this romantic comedy. According to Spencer stars Jesse Bradford as the titular Spencer, an ad agency mail room clerk just-arrived in L.A. and eager to make his presence felt. Renting a room in a run-down mansion, Spencer crosses paths with shady eccentrics Ezra (David Krumholtz) and Feldy (Adam Goldberg), aspiring porn filmmakers who convince him to make inroads as a commercial director -- with little success. But when Spencer serendipitously meets his childhood sweetheart Melora (Mia Kirshner), who's currently stuck in a go-nowhere relationship with the smarmy Craig (Brad Rowe), things begin to look up(n)

programme.title: SuperBabies: Baby Geniuses 2
programme.desc: Directed by Bob Clark, Super Babies: Baby Geniuses 2 follows a new generation of ultra-smart talking toddlers who have landed in the center of a dastardly scheme perpetrated by media mogul Bill Biscane (Jon Voight). With the help of Kahuna (Leo, Myles, and Gerry Fitzgerald); part spy, part superhero, all baby Archie (Michael and Max Iles); Finkleman (Jordan and Jared Scheiderman); Alex (Joshua and Maxwell Lockhart); and Rosita (Keana and Maia Bastidas), the youngsters set off in hopes of preventing Biscane from launching a state-of-the-art satellite system which, if successful, would be capable of worldwide mind control(n)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Devious Lord Farquaad sends mighty ogre Shrek to rescue his bride for him. Horny dragons, wise-cracking donkeys and a grumpy ogre who just wants to be back in his swamp(n)

programme.title: Police Academy: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Comedy with the inept officers back for the last time and this time against the Russian Mafia(n)

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: From the creators of Scary Movie and Date Movie comes this tongue-in-cheek parody of the sword-and-sandal epics, dubbed Meet the Spartans. The 20th Century Fox production was written and directed by the filmmaking team of Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer. Sure, Leonidas may have nothing more than a cape and some leather underwear to protect him from the razor-sharp swords of his Persian enemies, but that won't stop the brave leader and his team of 13 warriors from defending their beloved homeland against a powerful invading force that includes the likes of a mutant Paris Hilton, the Transformers, the Ghost Rider, and Rocky Balboa(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: In Terry Gilliam's inventive fantasy, the famed authors are cast as con artists who get caught up in a real-life fairy tale involving a haunted forest where girls have been disappearing. Matt Damon and Heath Ledger star in this whimsical adventure. Jonathan Pryce, Monica Bellucci, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot(n)

programme.title: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
programme.desc: Woody Allen's crime comedy caper with hypnotism gone wrong(n)

programme.title: Riding in Cars With Boys
programme.desc: (2001) Drew Barrymore is a bright, ambitious teenager, determined to escape her working class background with parents James Woods and Lorraine Bracco. But on the rebound from a crush, she falls for and falls pregnant by Steve Zahn, an amiable but not-too-bright boy. At 16, she's a wife and a mother, still determined to finish college but weighed down by responsibility. Penny Marshall's film, told in flashback, is based on Beverly D'Onfrio's book of her struggle to become a writer. M,W,R,(n)

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: In this sequel to Friday, Ice Cube returns as the streetwise LA dude who grassed up a local gangster. Who's now out and on his trail. This would be a good time to chill out in the suburbs with cousin Mike Epps and uncle Don 'Dc' Curry, who happens to have won the lottery but, as he finds out, money can't buy you love or security in Steve Carr's smart comedy(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Channing Tatum and Alex Pettyfer star in Steven Soderbergh's drama about male strippers in Florida. Drawing partly on his own real-life experiences of stripping when he was a teen, Tatum plays the movie's eponymous central character. Mike is in his 30s and has for some time earned his living by disrobing for the cash-paying audiences who frequent the Xquisite All-Male Revue. However, he's given reason to reassess the way his life is going when a new young recruit, Adam, joins the team. The enthusiasm with which Adam embraces his new lifestyle only serves to sharpen Mike's awareness of its shallowness; and then there's Adam's sister Brooke, who Mike begins to fall in love with..(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her(n)

programme.title: Project Nim
programme.desc: Documentary about Nim Chimpsky, the chimpanzee who in the 1970s became the focus of a landmark experiment which aimed to show that an ape could learn to communicate with language if raised and nurtured like a human child. Following Nim's extraordinary journey through human society, and the enduring impact he makes on the people he meets along the way, the film is an unflinching and unsentimental biography of an animal we tried to make human.Dir: James Marsh

Lion: Harvey Korman. The Boy Who Cried Wolf: Jaleel White. Monsieur Fox: Dabney Coleman. Grape Fox: Melanie Chartoff. Tortoise/Ant: Ruth Brown. Mouse/Grasshopper: Kevin Pollak. Hare: Katey Sagal. programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Jack and the Beanstalk. Jack and the Beanstalk is a classic story that transcends ethnic boundaries. After all, foolishness knows no color. Happily Ever After demonstrates this with an African-American retelling of the fairy tale. When Jack comes across some magic beans, he unwittingly plants danger in the backyard. HBO originally presented this universal program featuring the voices of Robert Guillaume, Harry Belafonte, and Tone-Loc. Jack must use his wits and luck to escape the rhyming giant. When he does, he learns a valuable lesson about greed. Jack and the Beanstalk is recommended for ages four to nine(n)

programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds(n)

programme.title: The Astronaut Farmer
programme.desc: A former trainee astronaut who failed to make the grade tries to fulfil his extraterrestrial dream by building his own spaceship in a barn. However, fearful that an amateur success would be an embarrassment to the space programme, the US Government are eager to prevent him from launching the craft(n)

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: An adventurous girl finds another world that is a strangely idealised version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets(n)

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Second sequel in the popular animated fantasy franchise. Newlyweds Shrek and Fiona face their first marital hurdle when the sudden death of King Harold means Shrek himself is next in line. However, with fatherhood looming, Shrek is reluctant. He decides to try and find the true heir - Fiona's errant, rebellious cousin. But while Shrek and his faithful companions Donkey and Puss in Boots go off in search of the heir, handsome rogue Prince Charming stages a coup at the castle(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Two professional divers are hired to search for lost treasure, but soon discover their employers' motives to be much more sinister than first thought

programme.title: Renegades
programme.desc: Young Guns co-stars Kiefer Sutherland and Lou Diamond Philips star respectively as a renegade cop and an American-Indian who must put aside their various differences and team up in order to catch a brutal criminal who has made off with a $2million hoard of diamonds and a priceless ancient Indian artefact. Breakneck action scenes and the chemistry between the two young leads highlight this fast-paced cop thriller

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube stars in this slick comedy-drama about a day in the life of the cutups who work and hang out at a barbershop on Chicago's South Side. Cube plays Calvin Palmer, an entrepreneurial soul who inherits his father's struggling hair business. Unfortunately, Calvin doesn't want to be the head honcho, so he sells the shop to a local loan shark---a move that greatly upsets his regulars. Cedric the Entertainer

programme.title: Broad Street Bullies
programme.desc: Documentary on the Philadelphia Flyers of the 1970s and the aggressive style of play that won them back-to-back Stanley Cups. Beloved in their home city and despised elsewhere, the Flyers were one of the most polarizing champions in sports. Among those interviewed are Bobby Clarke; Bill Barber; Dave Schultz; Bill Clement; and Gary Dornhoefer

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: Adventure story about a team of scientists who find themselves at the mercy of genetically modified sharks. A millionaire hoping to find a cure for brain diseases establishes a research programme on a lab at sea. As part of this research, a doctor begins experimenting on sharks, causing them to mutate and become intelligent and highly aggressive. Soon the humans and sharks are locked in a deadly battle for survival

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: A parody of 1950s teen musicals involving a bad boy who falls for a rich girl

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: Duncan Tucker's film stars Oscar-nominated, Golden Globe-winner Felicity Huffman as Sabrina 'Bree' Osbourne, a man who is preparing to undergo the final part of sex change surgery. Until her therapist, who can authorise the final operation, drops a bombshell. As Stanley, she fathered a son, Toby, who is now a teenage male prostitute and in trouble with the law. Before Bree can have the final operation, she must meet up with him and resolve both his problems and her feelings. Bailing him out in New York, she agrees to drive him to L.A. and on the road, they learn about each other as Toby tries to accept both his father... and his mother

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: In this creepy prequel to hit horror The Conjuring, a couple are tormented by a doll that has been possessed by an evil spirit

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: In this raunchy satire based on the hit HBO series, young Hollywood A-lister Vincent Chase (Adrian Grenier) and his posse of best buds (Kevin Connolly, Jerry Ferrara and Kevin Dillon) negotiate the perils and pleasures of Hollywood life, with the help of superagent Ari Gold (Jeremy Piven)

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A financially strapped single mother descends into a dark world in order to protect her family. Meanwhile, her son confronts the town bully and discovers a hidden utopia

programme.title: Friday Night Lights
programme.desc: High school coach Gary has some of the best high school players in Texas. But when his star running back is injured in Game Two, can he inspire the team to victory?

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: Duncan Tucker's film stars Oscar-nominated, Golden Globe-winner Felicity Huffman as Sabrina 'Bree' Osbourne, a man who is preparing to undergo the final part of sex change surgery. Until her therapist, who can authorise the final operation, drops a bombshell. As Stanley, she fathered a son, Toby, who is now a teenage male prostitute and in trouble with the law. Before Bree can have the final operation, she must meet up with him and resolve both his problems and her feelings. Bailing him out in New York, she agrees to drive him to L.A. and on the road, they learn about each other as Toby tries to accept both his father... and his mother

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends open themselves up to a terrifying ordeal when they attempt to summon spirits through a Ouija board

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: In this creepy prequel to hit horror The Conjuring, a couple are tormented by a doll that has been possessed by an evil spirit(n)

programme.title: Slither
programme.desc: James Gunn's directorial debut is an enjoyable splatter/ monster/ horror movie which begins when a courting couple, seeking privacy in the woods near small town Wheelsy, come across a just-landed meteorite. In no time at all, he's transformed into a toothy squid-like killing creature, while she becomes the breeder of deadly blood-thirsty slugs. Dry-witted police chief Bill Pardy (Nathan Fillion) is soon on the case but his problems are compounded when the victims of the slugs start coming back to life as slaves of the aliens. Premiere(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A former climber rises to the occasion when his sister gets trapped in an ice crevasse near the snowy summit of K2(n)

programme.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: An adaptation of Thomas Hardy's seminal novel about a beautiful but headstrong woman who attracts three very different male suitors throughout her life in Victorian England(n)

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: During a confession, a priest is threatened with murder, leaving him to wonder who in the community might be responsible(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: A Good Opportunity. Comedy series about Kiwi folk musicians Bret and Jemaine as they to try to make it big in New York. Since his success managing the Crazy Doggs, Murray is in a big office downtown and doesn't have enough time to devote to the Conchords, so Bret and Jemaine fire him. But when they get a job doing the advertising jingle for Femident toothpaste they realise there were things Murray did behind the scenes(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: Director Gary Shore revamps the mythos surrounding Vlad the Impaler in Dracula Year Zero, a Universal Pictures release from a script by Matt Sazama and Burk Sharpless. The horror tale is set to take place in Romania during the Turkish invasion as Vlad (Luke Evans) goes to the greatest of lengths to fight for his homeland -- even if it means selling his soul and becoming forever doomed as a creature of the night(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this hilarious installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to re-create a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park(n)

programme.title: The Tailor of Panama
programme.desc: (2001) Pierce Brosnan plays Andrew Osnard, a British spy banished to Panama after a series of indiscretions. Trying to win himself back into favour, he latches on to tailor Harry Pendel (Geoffrey Rush), whose wife Louisa (Jamie Lee Curtis) works for the government(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Juno may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker, the pregnant teen quickly realises how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah, who's always willing to help out in a pinch(n)

programme.title: As Above, So Below
programme.desc: A group of subterranean explorers encounter terror beneath the streets of Paris after descending into the city's ancient catacombs. Just when it seems their journey can't get any more nightmarish, the demons of their pasts strike back with a vengeance(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this hilarious installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to re-create a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park(n)

programme.title: The Tailor of Panama
programme.desc: (2001) Pierce Brosnan plays Andrew Osnard, a British spy banished to Panama after a series of indiscretions. Trying to win himself back into favour, he latches on to tailor Harry Pendel (Geoffrey Rush), whose wife Louisa (Jamie Lee Curtis) works for the government(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Taut drama about an ambitious young stockbroker who is seduced by money and power when he hooks up with a high-powered company trader. But he faces a crisis of conscience when he discovers the truth behind the trader's bid to buy up an airline for which his father is a union rep. Michael Douglas won an Oscar for Best Actor for his portrayal of Gordon Gekko - the personification of 80s greed

programme.title: Suicide Kings
programme.desc: In this hip crime drama, a spoiled rich teen's (Henry Thomas) sister is abducted, and he and his punk friends decide to kidnap an ex-mob boss (Christopher Walken) as a negotiating tool. But the wily mobster turns the tables on his bungling captors. Denis Leary, Sean Patrick Flanery, Jay Mohr, Jeremy Sisto, Laura San Giacomo

programme.title: Becoming Mike Nichols
programme.desc: A compilation of discussions between director Mike Nichols (1931-2014) and his colleague Jack O'Brien includes the former's recollections of his early career in show business, including his comedy performances with Elaine May in the late 1950s; stage directions of "Barefoot in the Park" (1963) and "The Odd Couple" (1965); and making the films "Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?" (1966) and "The Graduate" (1967). The interviews were filmed at the Golden Theatre in New York City in July 2014

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Comedy drama in which two childhood friends who have both grown up with religious vocations, one as a Catholic priest and one as a rabbi, fall for the same woman. Their religious commitments should prevent either of them from pursuing the relationship, but the temptation puts a strain on their vocations as well as their friendship

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Profiles of men and women in New York City who struggle to eke out a living by collecting bottles and cans to redeem at recycling centers for five cents apiece. An Oscar nominee for Best Documentary Short film

programme.title: Trouble With the Curve
programme.desc: An ailing baseball scout is given one last chance to prove his competence - and to reconnect with his daughter - on a scouting trip to North Carolina. Drama

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part One. In the first part of this five-part adaptation of James M. Cain's 1941 novel, Depression-era housewife Mildred Pierce searches for work to maintain a middle-class lifestyle after her husband leaves her with two young daughters in Glendale, California

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part Two. Set in Depression-era California, this absorbing drama follows tenacious single mother Mildred as she strives to make ends meet after the breakdown of her marriage. Forced to take a job as a waitress, Mildred's baking skills quickly give her humble status a boost, but she soon realsies that the approval of her snooty daugher Veda (Morgan Turner/Evan Rachel Wood) is impossible to acquire

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part Three. Set in Depression-era California, this absorbing drama follows tenacious single mother Mildred as she strives to make ends meet after the breakdown of her marriage. Forced to take a job as a waitress, Mildred's baking skills quickly give her humble status a boost, but she soon realsies that the approval of her snooty daugher Veda (Morgan Turner/Evan Rachel Wood) is impossible to acquire

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part Four. Set in Depression-era California, this absorbing drama follows tenacious single mother Mildred as she strives to make ends meet after the breakdown of her marriage. Forced to take a job as a waitress, Mildred's baking skills quickly give her humble status a boost, but she soon realsies that the approval of her snooty daugher Veda (Morgan Turner/Evan Rachel Wood) is impossible to acquire

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part Five. Conclusion. Mildred marries Monty and buys his Pasadena mansion, but imprudent financial moves get her in trouble with the restaurant's investors, and her reconciliation with 19-year-old opera sensation Veda (Evan Rachel Wood) proves to be short-lived

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Two strangers become pawns in a diabolical plot and must work together to discover what is really happening while trying to prove that they are not terrorists. Shia LaBeouf ("Disturbia") and Michelle Monaghan star in this taut suspense thriller. Michael Chiklis, Rosario Dawson, Billy Bob Thornton. Directed by D.J. Caruso

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Adaptation of the TV series set in the 1960s, detailing the first pairing of American agent Napoleon Solo with Russian operative Illya Kuryakin

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: An American/Chinese joint anti-cybertheft task force races to root out an elusive hacker based in Southeast Asia in this Legendary Pictures thriller written, produced, and directed by Michael Mann, and starring Chris Hemsworth

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: Remake of the post-apocalyptic action film, in which Max meets Imperator Furiosa and agrees to help her cross the desert. On the run from Immortan Joe, the two rebels must escape the madness and seek sanctuary

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: College student Lewis Thomas takes a trip across country to pick up his dream girl, Venna. On the way he is joined by his brother Fuller and together they play a practical joke on a trucker over a CB radio. Now the trucker wants revenge..(n)

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: Disturbing thriller about the hunt for a killer - known only as Casanova - who has kidnapped a number of women and murdered two of them. When a detective's niece goes missing, he is drawn into a complex and highly personal investigation. The local police are unappreciative of his efforts, but his niece manages to escape with valuable information about the killer(n)

programme.title: Citizen U.S.A.: A 50 State Road Trip
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi's patriotic travelogue crisscrosses the U.S. to attend naturalization ceremonies in all 50 states and listens to recent immigrants from around the world explain their decision to become American citizens. The film is inspired by the naturalization process experienced by Pelosi's Dutch-born husband, Michiel Vos(n)

programme.title: Hearts in Atlantis
programme.desc: A troubled boy finds solace with mysterious lodger Ted Brautigan. Young Bobby is picked on at school, but Ted's stories and insightful wisdom give him the confidence to stand up to his bullies. Evocative coming of age tale(n)

programme.title: Kissing Jessica Stein
programme.desc: After a string of dates with men from hell, Jessica Stein (Jennifer Westfeldt) answers a lonely hearts ad placed by a woman hoping for companionship who shares her interests. But Helen (Heather Juergensen) has other ideas and Stein finds herself in a torrid affair in Charles Herman-Wurmfeld's romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: In this galvanizing feminist drama, a working-class laundress (Carey Mulligan) in 19th century London becomes radicalized when she meets a brave cadre of women organizing to obtain the vote(n)

programme.title: How to Let Go of the World and Love All the Things Climate Can't Change
programme.desc: A look at communities around the world that have been harshly impacted by the effects of climate change. This documentary also spotlights inspiring efforts to create a greener, more-sustainable existence(n)

programme.title: Connie and Carla
programme.desc: Two women are forced to go on the run after witnessing a brutal crime. Seeking refuge as entertainers they find the kind of success they always dreamed of(n)

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: Rachel is sent to stay with her grandmother after causing trouble for her mum and stepdad(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Greed is good: ambitious stockbroker Charlie Sheen sells his soul to corporate shark Michael Douglas. Oliver Stone's 80s classic shattered the American Dream(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: The appointment of black coach Herman Boone to a high school in 70s Virginia causes a stir in the town, where white coach Yoast is well-respected. Boone walks into a minefield of bigotry but his fair-minded approach gradually wins the hearts of his players(n)

programme.desc: Face of the Franchise. Meanwhile, Ricky's blindsided by bad news before his 30th birthday party; and Charles enjoys being in the spotlight again(n)

programme.desc: Un empresario decide ampliar su floreciente negocio hotelero cuando una sola vacante deja poco espacio para la variedad de personas mayores excéntricas que buscan un lugar en el mejor exótico hotel Marigold. (cc)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A university student enters into a sadomasochistic relationship with a businessman, whose desire for extreme intimacy stems from secrets from his past. Based on the best-selling novel by E L James

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage is a burnt-out paramedic once nicknamed Father Frank for his efforts to rescue lives, Frank sees the ghosts of those he failed to save around every turn. He has tried everything he can to get fired - calling in sick, delaying calls when he might have to face another victim he can't help - but he cannot quit the job on his own. Director Martin Scorsese returns to the smoky streets he explored so memorably in the seminal Taxi Driver

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: Engineer Peter Bowden is snatched by professional terrorists in the South American jungle. While the western hostage negotiators pull out, ex-SAS man Terry Thorne takes the job for Peter's distraught wife Alice. But the rising tension only draws the pair together. A well-made, gripping thriller

programme.title: Barb Wire
programme.desc: A bounty hunter's town and business are under siege by warring factions in this futuristic fantasy about comic-book babe Barb Wire

programme.title: Lorenzo's Oil
programme.desc: Fact-based story of parents seeking a cure for their son's life-threatening illness

programme.title: My Blueberry Nights
programme.desc: Elizabeth has just been through a particularly nasty break-up, and now she's ready to leave her friends and memories behind as she chases her dreams across the U.S. In order to support herself on her journey, Elizabeth picks up a series of waitress jobs along the way. As Elizabeth crosses paths with a series of lost souls whose yearnings are even greater than her own -- including a troubled cop , his estranged wife, and an embittered gambler -- their emotional turmoil ultimately helps her gain a greater understanding of her own problems

programme.title: Murderous Intent
programme.desc: Gripping psychological study delving into the well-constructed murder of an upper-class British schoolboy (Tom Sturridge) by a classmate (Eddie Redmayne). Strangely, evidence suggests that the minds of the two young men may have become one. Toni Collette, who also serves as an executive producer, costars as the forensic psychologist investigating the case who discovers a disturbing connection between the two. Written and directed by Gregory J. Read

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A businessman tries to land a major deal and save his fledging company. To do so, he and two co-workers, one very old and one very young, must take an overseas trip to show their potential customer a wild night on the town

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Adam Sandler and Kevin James make a hilarious couple in this riotous farce about a widowed firefighter who asks his straight pal to pose as his gay lover so that his kids can receive life-insurance benefits. Jessica Biel, Dan Aykroyd, Ving Rhames, Steve Buscemi. Directed by Dennis Dugan

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: DA Harvey Dent and vengeful scientist The Riddler plan to take down Batman. The Gotham City superhero is going to need his new partner, boy wonder Robin. But will he be able to cope with the distraction of sexy doc Chase Meridian?

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: A mistake one-night stand becomes much more when a rising star TV personality realizes she's pregnant. A lifetime slacker is then thrust into responsibilities of fatherhood in this romp

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: This hilarious mockumentary comedy follows four vampire roommates and their immortal struggle to be cool. When they're not looking for their next meal, they're stirring up trouble with the local lycanthropes and bickering over housework

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: An atmospheric phenomenon enables a New York police officer to communicate with his beloved dead father, a fire fighter and amateur radio enthusiast, across thirty years of time. He manages to warn his father of his own death, but by changing events in history they unwittingly cause a tragedy, and now need to try to alter history again(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: From the Shadows It Watches. Rev. Anderson's powers are tested; Patricia reaches out to Kyle; and Sidney issues a warning(n)

programme.title: Mirrors
programme.desc: Kiefer Sutherland stars in hardcore horror director Alexandre Aja's remake of the Korean psychological/ supernatural chiller Into the Mirror. Ben Carson's life is on a downward trajectory: he's been suspended from his police detective post; he's losing his battle with alcoholism; and he seems determined to test to destruction his relationship with his estranged wife Amy. To make ends meet, Carson takes a night watchman job at the Mayflower, a massive department store that was badly damaged in an arson attack some time ago. While on his rounds, he starts to catch sight of startling images featuring violent visions of self-mutilation in the abandoned shop's various mirrors. Initially he ascribes his experiences to being alone in unsettling isolation at night. However, when his family also starts to be affected, he is convinced they are all in danger. Clues to what's happening come in the form of mysterious references to 'Esseker' and Carson's discovery of the building's original purpose. And, once he's learnt the shocking truth, can he stop the Mayflower's evil influence before anyone else gets hurt?(n)

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: Epic biopic of one of America's most influential political leaders. The film traces Malcolm's life and the development of his philosophy, from a difficult childhood in Harlem and Boston, via his conversion to Islam and his rejection of integration and non-violent resistance, to his eventual renunciation of his separatist beliefs(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: A suburban house is plagued by "noisy ghosts" (poltergeists) who abduct the young daughter of the owners, so a parapsychologist and a "haunted-house cleaner" are brought in to rescue the little girl, whose father uncovers the reasons why their home has been chosen to play host to malevolent spirits(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A secret agent recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organisation. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions(n)

programme.title: Clean and Sober
programme.desc: The directorial debut of Glenn Gordon Caron, the creator of the television series Moonlighting (1985-89), this intense, gritty drama was received as one of the best-ever cinematic treatments of substance abuse. Michael Keaton stars as Daryl Poynter, a hustling, successful Philadelphia real estate agent who has become addicted to cocaine. He's already got problems, including nearly a $100,000 embezzled from his employer and lost on the stock market, when he wakes up one morning with a young woman dead in his bed from a coke overdose. His company is asking questions about the missing funds, and the dead girl's father is plastering his neighborhood with posters accusing Daryl of being a murderer, so he decides to hide out in an anonymous drug treatment program. There, however, Daryl runs into tough-minded counselor and former addict Craig (Morgan Freeman), who has heard all of Daryl's lies and tricks before. Daryl also finds romance with an abused fellow addict, Charlie Standers (Kathy Baker), and understanding with his Alcoholics Anonymous sponsor (M. Emmet Walsh)(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: War drama recreating the dramatic rescue of more than 500 American prisoners of war from the notorious Japanese POW camp near Cabanatuan in the Philippines. General Douglas MacArthur chose men from the Sixth Ranger Battalion to undertake a mission 30 miles behind enemy lines, during which they would face enemy forces known for their ferocity(n)

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Harrison Ford steps into a different sort of heroic action role in this suspense-drama, based on a true story. In 1961, with America and the Soviet Union locked in the bitter struggle of the Cold War, the Soviets initiated a crash course to build and launch their first ballistic nuclear submarine to stand against America's seagoing nuclear arsenal. While Capt. Mikhail Polenin (Liam Neeson) had initially been put in charge of the sub, after lengthy delays and numerous mechanical failures, military chief Marshal Zelentstov (Joss Ackland) dropped Polenin down a rung in the chain of command and named tough-as-nails Capt. Alexei Vostrikov (Harrison Ford) commander of the ship. While Polenin's pride is stung when Vostrikov is named skipper, his greatest concern is that the ship is unsafe and not yet ready for launch; Vostrikov and Zelentstov supersede his objections, and the sub sets sail on schedule. However, Polenin's fears prove to be horribly prescient; as they sail beneath the waters near the United States' Eastern Seaboard, the ship's nuclear reactor goes haywire at sea, and experiences a near meltdown. Polenin and Vostrikov realize that a nuclear disaster aboard the sub is a very real possibility, which could not only send a deadly dose of radiation across America's East Coast, but could result in an explosion (and subsequent missile release) that would likely launch World War III. The adversarial Polenin and Vostrikov must set aside their differences and sacrifice their own safety in the interest of protecting innocent lives around the world. K-19: The Widowmaker also stars Peter Sarsgaard, John Shrapnel, and Donald Sumpter(n)

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.sub-title: When Hall Freezes Over/Lost in Character.
programme.desc: Double bill. When the team awesomises the dreary weather by creating an indoor snow day at school, Lars is terrified that the legendary Yetis of Norg will show up to settle a generations-old score. Desperate to show her family she's a great party planner, Thera has the team transmogrified into superheroes for her little cousin's birthday. However, when she pushes Les too deep into character, he might never come back.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Weinerman Tested, Cunningham Approved/Sorcerer in Love 2: Sorceress' Revenge.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys inadvertently help create a Ninja-seeking robot. Then, the Sorceress has returned to seek revenge on the Ninja.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. A classic macho hero recruits Wander and Sylvia to join him on his quest to save a kidnapped princess. Then, Peepers gets Hater an arena full of death traps for his birthday.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer loses his guitar-pick necklace and cannot see Billy any more. Billy is so desperate for attention he inadvertently convinces Hugh and Jane the house is haunted. Spencer enters a Halloween competition to find the best haunted house. The winner gets to work with a famous special effects director. Lolo is determined to thwart Spencer.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer gets what he deserves when he cons Hugh into taking him on a camping trip so he can shoot a desert-themed horror movie.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat's surly teenage son Junior arrives in a space pod having run away from home. As Junior struts around, threatening to blow Kat's cover, Coop helps Kat send him back. Dad accidentally swaps some of Kat's weapons for other stuff, so Coop tries to get them back.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Don't Give Me No Static/Storm Drained.
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop borrows one of Kat's experiments for a science project but it does not work out as planned. Then, Kat's weather-changing machine could interrupt the annual Bootsville versus Timber Lake tournament.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Lucius O'Thunderpunch/Bring Me the Head of Ranginald Bagel!.
programme.desc: Double bill. McFist introduces himself as superhero, Lucius O'Thunderpunch. Then, Randy accidentally endangers a kid at school.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Weinerman Tested, Cunningham Approved/Sorcerer in Love 2: Sorceress' Revenge.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys inadvertently help create a Ninja-seeking robot. Then, the Sorceress has returned to seek revenge on the Ninja.

programme.title: Boyster
programme.sub-title: Love at First Sight/Shelby the Art Lover.
programme.desc: Double bill. A lovelorm Shelby steals a painting of a clam shell. Then, Boyster discovers he has no skeleton, so swallows one belonging to a monkey.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: The kings discover Mason has an estranged brother and are determined to re-unite the [air, against Mason's wishes.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Sabrina, leader of the Amazons, wangles a date with Brady. Mikayla tries to warn him off but he does not believe her, until he's kidnapped and Mikayla has to rescue him.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys go back in time to the stone age, where they end up inventing the wheel.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Perry fears his cover will be blown when he becomes the company mascot of a hardware store, and Dad competes in an evil contest against Doof and Rodney.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: That's the Spirit/The Curse of Candace.
programme.desc: Double bill of Halloween episodes. The boys rid a house of ghosts, Doof becomes a were-cow, and the boys invent a mind-controlling gadget, which they use to make Candace think she is a vampire. programme.desc: Mabel's weird new boyfriend discloses some of the town's strange and uncanny secrets. Dipper finds a mysterious journal that hints at more of the town's hidden secrets.
